title: Does Riot think that all pro junglers would suddenly quit the game if lee was nerfed?
body: I'm pretty sure that most pros wouldn't throw away their career over a single champion and could easily adapt...

replies.body:
They'd just play Jarvan instead...

Oh wait, they already are!
if they nerf lee, reksai would be the next lee.
Lee doesn't even need a nerf. He falls off pretty hard late game. Or you could learn to dodge q's.
